name: Mining Town
description: A mining town built around valuable mineral deposits offers wealth and employment, but the dangerous work and environmental damage create health risks. The mining industry attracts both honest workers and greedy speculators, while the underground tunnels can hide ancient secrets or dangerous creatures.
atmosphere: Community built around earth wealth extraction. Air carries ore, coal dust, and valuable minerals metallic tang. Pickaxes, machinery, and miner activity create industry and labor rhythm. Dangerous work creates worker camaraderie. Promise of wealth attracts honest laborers and fortune seekers. Underground tunnels create mystery and danger. Environmental damage serves as progress cost reminder.
